name: Compatible Payrix Gateway for Easy Digital Downloads
author: saurav.rox

sections.description:
This is a simple addon for the Easy Digital Downloads WordPress plugin to use the Payrix payment gateway.

Payrix gateway supports multiple currency and this plugin is meant to be used by merchants in Australia, New Zealand, the USA and UK.

Established in Australia in 2009, Payrix is a specialist payment services provider boasting a management team that combines over 40 years of experience in the industry. Operating in Australia, New Zealand, the USA and UK, Payrix is known for technology innovation and client service.

After checkout on the website it redirects the user to the Payrix payment screen where the customer can make the payment.

The plugin requires a test or live API key which can be found from the Payrix account settings at https://www.integrapay.com.au

This add on is fully translatable.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/edd-integrapay directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly (recommended).
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Enter your API keys and choose test-mode for making test payments
  4. Visit the Easy Digital Downloads payment gateway settings and select the Payment gateways you want to activate in your checkout page.
  5. Select the payment icons you want to be visible on the checkout page.
sections.faq:
What Do I Need To Use The Plugin

  1. You need to have Easy Digital Downloads plugin installed and activated on your WordPress site.
  2. You need to open a Payrix merchant account on Payrix

Where can I ask for help or customisation requests?

You can visit https://saurabadhikari.com.np/ or drop an email to onlysaurab@gmail.com at anytime.
